Procedure Note
Attending: [REDACTED]
Resident: [REDACTED]

Indication: RLL obstruction.

Procedure Steps:
1. Time out performed.
2. Moderate sedation administered.
3. Scope inserted through left nare.
4. Airway inspection showed diffuse tracheobronchitis and significant mucous plugging.
5. Therapeutic aspiration of mucus plugs performed bilaterally.
6. RLL washing obtained.

Plan: Await cultures.
